FuncDef:
The port-mirroring observe-port command configures port mirroring on a port.
The undo port-mirroring command disables port mirroring on a port. The port-mirroring observe-port command configures port mirroring on a port. The undo port-mirroring command disables port mirroring on a port. By default, port mirroring is not configured on a port.
CLIs: undo port-mirroring [ observe-port <observe-port-index> ] { both | inbound | outbound }
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of the observing port.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8.

Mirrors incoming and outgoing packets on a port.
-

-

ExtraInfo: In port mirroring, you can run the port-mirroring observe-port command to mirror traffic to a specified observing port.
